meanings.definition: A small or insignificant amount or value.
meanings.sent1: I found diddlysquat in my pocket after the party.
meanings.sent2: She didn't care diddlysquat about the color of the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried diddlysquat compared to the mighty elephant.
meanings.sent4: His promise meant diddlysquat when he never showed up.
meanings.sent5: The old coin was worth diddlysquat to the collector.

meanings.sent1: He knows diddlysquat about fixing cars.
meanings.sent2: She can't sing diddlysquat, but she loves to try.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear into diddlysquat!
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass by diddlysquat during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The lost key was found in the drawer, where it had been hiding in diddlysquat.
